full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Audiovisual Equipment and Installation #[WS3981297515](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16150850?extsite=MTYxNTA4NTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Request for Proposal (RFP) with Open Bidding

The Government of Canada has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) solicitation for the supply, installation, and integration of an advanced audiovisual (AV) system, along with desktop workstations, for the refit of Les Terrasses de la Chaudière Phase 1a in Gatineau, Quebec.

#### Background Information

This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number [WS3491363957](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16150850?extsite=MTYxNTA4NTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==), dated December 1, 2022, with a closing of February 28, 2023 at 14:00.

#### Scope of Work

The scope of work comprises the supply, installation, and integration of a fully functional AV system, along with the setup and delivery of desktop workstations. An optional component of the contract also includes the provision of up to three (3) years of support and maintenance services, as detailed in Annex A - Scope of Work.

#### Project Timeline and Milestones

Estimates suggest that installation will commence in January 2024 and conclude by October 2024.

A mandatory site visit for potential bidders will take place on May 9, 2023. To participate, interested parties must submit their requests to the Contracting Authority no later than May 8, 2023, at 2:00 pm.

#### Key Highlights

* The contract refers to item UNSPC categories 52160000, 52161500, and 52161600, which correspond to consumer electronics, audio and visual equipment, and audio visual equipment accessories, respectively.
* This procurement aligns with the Catalogue of Goods and Services of the Government of Canada.
